name: Nations Saver
details: The freedom to save Reward yourself with a Nations Saver account to enjoy a host of privileges and special benefits. A Nations Saver account lets you manage your day-to-day transactions with ease and convenience while earning interest on your daily balance. <!-- About Us Page ==========================================--> Make your savings work for you Tiered Interest Rates, as your funds grow Easy Banking - 365 day banking with extended hours in selected branches 24 hour access - Keep track with free phone and internet banking Our e-statement facility Free internet and mobile banking facilities Joint accounts can be opened Terms & Conditions Key Facts Document <!-- Portfolio Section ==========================================--> What you need Be a Sri Lankan National over 18 years with a valid NIC A Non National holding a valid resident visa Steps to get started Complete an account opening form Submit a copy of your NIC or Passport Documentary evidence for address verification
